definitions: the quality of being made or produced by human beings rather than occurring naturally

examples.text: vigorous debates about the authenticity of the original and the artificiality of the copy

shortDefinitions: quality of being made or produced by human beings rather than occurring naturally

definitions: the quality of being contrived or false

examples.text: users complain about the artificiality of war games

shortDefinitions: quality of being contrived or false

examples.text: he claimed to have been horrified by the artificiality of his actors during the making of his first feature film

shortDefinitions: quality of being insincere or affected
